summary: The Penguin is an upcoming American TV series based on the DC Comics character of the same name. It is a spin-off of the 2022 film, 'The Batman', and explores the character's rise to power in Gotham City's criminal underworld. The series is produced by DC Studios and Warner Bros. Television, with Lauren LeFranc as the showrunner. Colin Farrell stars as the Penguin, alongside a large ensemble cast. Development began in 2021, and filming took place in New York from 2023 to 2024, with a break due to labor disputes. The series will air on HBO in the US from September to November 2024, with eight episodes planned.
title: The Penguin (TV series)
